name: Broken Robot (kkrac)
description:
Game made for the GMTK 2020 Jam "Out of Control"

How your robot shoots is out of control!
Shoots not stop for a few seconds... and then stops shooting! Beware of the aliens!

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move the robot
  • Mouse to aim

Music: https://echev.itch.io/
Art: https://plumpanda.itch.io/
Programmer: https://kkrac.itch.io/
